item.description: JULY 4th - ALL DAY -- After the Amherst parade is over, consider going to the New Boston 4th of July celebration at the Hillsborough State Fairgrounds. Once again this would be another all-day 1PM - dusk deal where you could come and go anytime during to volunteer to speak with people passing through. The entry ticket is $4/person but can be used to go in and out whenever you wish. There might be a carload price too.
item.name: Hillsborough 4th of July
